name: MultiMapUtils_getCollectionTest
description: Unit tests for the MultiMapUtils.getCollection method.

test_cases.name: testGetCollection_WithNonNullMap
test_cases.description: Tests the getCollection method with a non-null map, ensuring it returns the correct collection for a given key.

test_cases.name: testGetCollection_WithNullMap
test_cases.description: Tests the getCollection method with a null map, ensuring it returns null.
